channel.title: Oh jeez! plz help with item.java
channel.description:
okay, this is annoying me, im trying to add varrock armours to my server, and i did, that wasnt a problem, but they keep equipping in the weapon slot, i added the id of the armours in item.java under body, that didnt work, so i tried, platebody, that didnt work, so i tried both, still no luck, can someone help PLEASE?
~btw: both times i compiled and got no errors, tested, and it still equipped in the weapon slot.~
